title: Bulletin
additional-notes: The first renewal shown here is the first we found specifically mentioning this serial. It was filed under Books, not Periodicals, as were renewals for some later issues.

Some issues of this serial may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, including issues before the first one mentioned here, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
